short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate names, from serious to silly, using various selections

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A fun and easy to use random multi-name generator.  

Select to generate names based on character types; Hero, Villain, Light. Dark, and even Silly.  A unique name can enhance any online MMORPG, LARP, or in person tabletop game.  Create "silly" names for tertiary characters.  Simply click the name to copy to the clipboard, then paste into the format of your choice.  This extension can also be used as a basis of inspiration for creating your own names.

For more fun, create random common names to...  well... do with as you wish!
